segments.text: Observing this kitchen, it's a typical domestic setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink, towel in hand on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet runs full, basin full to overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over, pooling on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe touches the edge of the wet area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, cabinets stand with doors ajar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy ascends the step stool toward the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He grasps a cookie, plate in other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby extends arm, expectant pose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above sink reveals garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back, daylight filters in softly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacks of dishes wait on counter, orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR
